title: Boeuf bourguignon
description: It’s worth getting good-quality, well-marbled meat from the butcher’s shop for this dish. The supermarket meat is often too lean and will become dry rather than succulent during the long cooking. Serve with creamy mashed potatoes and some green vegetables, or even a crisp side salad with a mustardy dressing.
ingredients: flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
200g/7oz smoked bacon lardons or smoked streaky bacon, cut into 2cm/¾in pieces
300g/10½oz button chestnut mushrooms, wiped and halved or quartered if large
